metadata.title: CVE-2019-10877 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Teeworlds 0.7.2, there is an integer overflow in CMap::Load() inengine/shared/map.cpp that can lead to a buffer overflow, becausemultiplication of width and height is mishandled.

criterions.comment: teeworlds: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
